title: EduCare
description: Designed and implemented a web app that manages institute's everything from students' attendance to result management and so on. It also keeps track of the students' progress and provides a platform for the teachers to communicate with the students and the guardians.

title: PawCare
description: Built an online PetCare Management System. It provides a platform for pet owners to find the best pet care services in their locality. It also provides a platform for pet care service providers to reach out to their customers. It also provides adoption services for pets.

title: C Compiler
description: Built a compiler from scratch for a subset of C language.
